医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
探讨 COVID-19 大流行之前和期间临床医生对远程听力学的态度研究人员探讨了听力学家对远程听力学的态度和使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/An-exploration-of-the-attitudes-towards-teleaudiology-for-clinicians-before-and-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/An-exploration-of-the-attitudes-towards-teleaudiology-for-clinicians-before-and-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8dafd855-f20b-451f-8cd6-7d0974c3ce32 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 06:03:00 -0400 An exploration of the attitudes towards teleaudiology for clinicians before and during the COVID-19 pandemic
益生菌补充剂在抗生素治疗期间真的有作用吗？研究表明可能不会研究人员评估了之前对接受抗生素治疗的患者进行对照试验的工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Do-probiotics-supplements-really-make-a-difference-during-antibiotic-treatment-Probously-not-says-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Do-probiotics-supplements-really-make-a-difference-during-antibiotic-treatment-Probously-not-says-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2095709-83c9-4123-9e2b-4b320899e120 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:34:00 -0400 Do probiotics supplements really make a difference during antibiotic treatment? Probably not, says research
研究对 COVID-19 中的细菌和真菌变化进行了全面分析研究人员使用纳米孔测序来确定 COVID-19 和非 COVID-19 患者肺部的真菌和细菌微生物群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-offers-a-compressive-analysis-of-bacterial-and-fungal-alterations-in-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Study-offers-a-compressive-analysis-of-bacterial-and-fungal-alterations-in-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a344412-8e12-4bd0-b063-2fabddaccda9 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:17:00 -0400 Study offers a comprehensive analysis of bacterial and fungal alterations in COVID-19
抗炎纳米粒子在治疗炎症性肠病方面显示出希望慢性炎症性肠病（IBD），例如克罗恩病和溃疡性结肠炎，在全球范围内呈上升趋势。当前药物的益处受到有问题的副作用的限制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Anti-炎症-纳米颗粒-show-promise-in-treating-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Anti-炎症-纳米颗粒-show-promise-in-treating-炎症-bowel-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6709a08-7683-4a88-8624-066a6ef78ec0 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:13:00 -0400
社区 COVID-19 疾病与病毒后疾病、疲劳、栓塞和呼吸道疾病的风险增加有关研究人员确定了严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 导致的医疗保健利用率变化的幅度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Community-COVID-19-disease-is-linked-with-increased-risks-of-post-viral-illness-fatigue-embolism-and-respiratory-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Community-COVID-19-disease-is-linked-with-increased-risks-of-post-viral-illness-fatigue-embolism-and-respiratory-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=731d0770-de30-4e11-8f13-19eb3a922168 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:09:00 -0400 Community COVID-19 disease is associated with increased risks of post-viral-illness, fatigue, embolism, and respiratory conditions
研究揭示了新型化合物在抑制癌基因翻译方面的治疗潜力卢森堡健康研究所的前沿研究揭示了化合物FL3在抑制癌基因翻译和重新布线癌细胞代谢方面具有突破性的治疗潜力，为白血病患者开辟了新的治疗机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Research-reveals-therapeutic-potial-of-novel-compound-in-inhibiting-oncogene-translation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Research-reveals-therapeutic-potial-of-novel-compound-in-inhibiting-oncogene-translation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=928443dc-9bb7-4145-acff-78511e4367d8 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:09:00 -0400 Research reveals therapeutic potential of novel compound in inhibiting oncogene translation
RCS England 与 Intuitive 合作塑造机器人辅助手术的未来领先的机器人辅助手术 (RAS) 公司 Intuitive 通过支持新的多专业网络，进一步发展对英国皇家外科医生学院 (RCS England) 的支持，该网络将塑造全国 RAS 手术的未来发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/RCS-England-and-Intuitive-partner-to-shape-the-future-of-robotic-assistance-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/RCS-England-and-Intuitive-partner-to-shape-the-future-of-robotic-assistance-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=548783cd-bf10-4a41-afbb-1807ad3802fb Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:07:00 -0400 RCS England and Intuitive partner to shape the future of robotic-assisted surgery
基因可以解释为什么一些腹部肥胖的人不会患上糖尿病传统观点认为，腹部储存脂肪会增加患 2 型糖尿病的风险。但弗吉尼亚大学医学院令人惊讶的新发现表明，我们基因中自然发生的变异可以导致一些人在腰部储存脂肪，但也可以保护他们免受糖尿病的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Genes-may-explain-why-some-people-with-abdominal-obesity-do-not-develop-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Genes-may-explain-why-some-people-with-abdominal-obesity-do-not-develop-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e90fd893-725d-4f09-9f8f-e4731aecf7bb Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:05:00 -0400 Genes may explain why some people with abdominal obesity do not develop diabetes
人工智能算法可以预测人们何时会退出数字减肥计划澳大利亚国家科学机构 CSIRO 的一项新研究显示了使用人工智能 (AI) 算法来提高数字健康计划的参与度和健康结果的潜在好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/AI-algorithm-can-predict-when-people-will-drop-out-of-digital-weight-loss-programs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/AI-algorithm-can-predict-when-people-will-drop-out-of-digital-weight-loss-programs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15639cd4-e18e-4693-ae21-53686930b90f Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:01:00 -0400 AI algorithm can predict when people will drop out of digital weight loss programs
饮食模式与阿尔茨海默病和相关痴呆症状的关联一篇新论文讨论了饮食对 AD 风险的影响，其中研究人员描述了特定营养素、饮食模式、AD 的其他风险因素以及驱动这些模式的心理社会因素之间的相互关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/The-association-of-dietary-patterns-with-Alzheimere28099s-disease-and-lated-dementia-symptomology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/The-association-of-dietary-patterns-with-Alzheimere28099s-disease-and-lated-dementia-symptomology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4eccd1dd-da4a-4603-81b1-fa3d55bed3f6 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 05:01:00 -0400 The association of dietary patterns with Alzheimer’s disease and related dementia symptomology
